name: ext_R3_Money_comparator
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Money.comparator for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Money.comparator from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Money|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: How the value should be understood and represented - whether the actual value is greater or less than the stated value due to measurement issues; e.g. if the comparator is "<" , then the real value is < stated value.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children unless an empty Parameters resource

constraint.human: Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element Money.comparator is flagged IsModifier

element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.
